title: Caelius
description: [Siren Erotic Sci-Fi May-December Romance, with M/M not including the heroes, HEA] Caelius Meron strips at Heat Seekers Male Revue just so he can find his mate. So imagine his shock when he finds her in a cooking class he was forced to attend. So what's the problem? There's twenty-two of them according to Rhia Brennan. Undaunted by her claim that he's too young, Caelius battles every roadblock she places. But what if one may be too difficult to ignore? Kallon Aceso knows exactly who should own his heart, but Ulixes Dionysus doesn't appear to want it. But is it really something else buried so deep that it may keep them apart forever? Travel with these two Insedi as they both chase their hearts' desire, only to be thwarted by misconceptions and mistakes from the past. Can they scale these insurmountable walls, or will they have to walk away and forever mourn what they could never have? Book 5 in the Fueled By Lust Series brings back the sexy males that make your legs tremble just by saying you name. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Celeste Prater
